Hello World!

My name is Avichal Warke. I'm a research scholar at Centre for Politcal Studies, Jawaharlal Nehru University, New Delhi.

My research work is focused on the intersections of Technology, Caste and Society and my interests are Anti-caste History and Philosophy, Political Philosophy, Ambedkar's Political Thought, Cinema, Communication Studies and AI.
